column1: Table 76. Cross-strait postal delivery and number of telephone incoming and outgoing volume
Note: The Ordinary Correspondence Posted to Mainland is operated from Apr. 18, 1988, and the Ordinary Correspondence Delivered from Mainland is operated
from Mar. 19, 1988. Besides, the Registered Correspondence between Taiwan and Mainland are posted and delivered from June 1, 1993.
Source: 1. Ministry of Transportation and Communications
